topic.title: User Management Preferences
topic.p: This option allows you to set the number of users you want displayed per page.

ol.title: To set the User Management Preferences:
ol.li: In the Control Panel, click User Management Preferences. The User Management Preferences window appears.

Next to Users per Page, select the maximum number of messages that you want displayed per page.
Note: If there are more users than the number per page you have selected, click First, Prev, Next, or Last inside the brackets at the top of the right column to navigate through the other users.
Click Save. A message appears informing you that your changes have been saved.
